Mattias Ekholm also scored and Leon Draisaitl had a pair of assists for the Oilers (14-11-6), who have won three of their last four games. Simon

articles.title: Hidden Game: Future looks bright for Jacob Fowler after stellar NHL debut
articles.description: Rookie goaltender looked poised beyond his years while blocking 33 shots in the Canadiens' 4-2 victory over Pittsburgh.

articles.title: PHOTO ESSAY: In Texas, a former Chinese official targeted by Beijing’s surveillance finds refuge
articles.description: MIDLAND, Texas (AP) — The Chinese government is using an increasingly powerful tool to control and monitor its own officials: Surveillance technology, much of it originating in the United States, an Associated Press investigation has found. articles.title: Christine Roy becomes Quebec’s new auditor general
articles.description: On Thursday, the National Assembly appointed Christine Roy to the position of auditor general of Quebec for a 10-year term. Roy succeeds Guylaine Leclerc, who retired last March. The 95 members present in the National Assembly on Thursday morning all voted in favor of Roy’s appointment. She pr

articles.title: A Chinese whistleblower now living in the US is being hunted by Beijing with help from US tech
articles.description: MIDLAND, Texas (AP) — Retired Chinese official Li Chuanliang was recuperating from cancer on a Korean resort island when he got an urgent call: Don’t return to China, a friend warned. articles.title: Oilers turn in smart, defensive game and Hyman hat trick for 4-1 win over Detroit: Cult of Hockey Player Grades
articles.description: The Edmonton Oilers turned in a solid effort at home against the Red Wings on Thursday, with a 4-1 win that never really seemed in much doubt. articles.title: McDavid finds a different level, paces Edmonton Oilers past Red Wings
articles.description: It was one of those games that, based on the balance of play, could have gone to either team. articles.title: Australia’s Albanese Pledges Deal to Save Rio Aluminum Plant
articles.description: The owners of Australia’s largest aluminum smelter have agreed to upgrade the plant as part of a government-backed rescue package aimed at keeping operations running beyond 2028.

articles.title: Laval police arrest two in break-ins at Greater Montreal businesses
articles.description: Laval police (SPL) said Wednesday that they arrested two suspects involved in several break-ins targeting pharmacies, eyewear shops and Sephora store across the Greater Montreal region. articles.title: Canadiens’ Fowler makes 33 saves to win NHL debut vs. Penguins
articles.description: PITTSBURGH — Jacob Fowler made 33 saves in his NHL debut and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 4-2 on Thursday night. Montreal gave the rookie plenty of support, as Alexandre Texier, Brendan Gallagher and Cole Caufield staked the Canadiens to a 3-0 lea

articles.title: Indiana Republicans defy Trump to reject new voting map
articles.description: Some say they were targeted with death threats and other forms of intimidation over the vote.

articles.title: Struggles continue for Winnipeg Jets in 6-3 loss to Bruins
articles.description: Gabriel Vilardi, Morgan Barron and Alex Iafallo scored for Winnipeg but a woeful penalty kill and defensive lapses proved too much to overcome.

articles.title: Quebec adopts Bill 109, law to set quotas on French-language content on streaming platforms
articles.description: Quebec will now be able to impose minimum French-language content thresholds on major platforms such as Netflix and Spotify. articles.title: Tsunami warning lifted after latest earthquake hits Japan’s northeast
articles.description: Two 20cm waves were observed in locations off the northeast coast of Japan before the advisory was lifted.

articles.title: Chilliwack General Hospital fundraiser launched for maternity clinic
articles.description: A new maternity clinic is expected to open in Chilliwack in February, and a fundraising campaign has been launched.

articles.title: Sharks top Maple Leafs 3-2 in overtime
articles.description: Alexander Wennberg scored at 2:49 of overtime as the San Jose Sharks came back from a two-goal deficit to top the Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 on Thursday night.

articles.title: Montreal researchers uncover possible treatment for inflammatory bowel disease
articles.description: Researchers from Montreal Clinical Research Institute (IRCM) have identified a new molecule, naturally produced in the body, could be used to treat inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). articles.title: ‘Catastrophic flooding’ in North America’s Pacific Northwest as rains ease
articles.description: Intense downpours were swept into the region this week by an 'atmospheric river' storm system from the Pacific Ocean.

articles.title: Pressure mounts on Quebec Liberal Leader Pablo Rodriguez to resign amid crisis
articles.description: A day earlier, Quebec's anti-corruption police announced they were launching a criminal investigation of the Quebec Liberals.
